original_title: Σ' Αυτή τη Χώρα Κανείς δεν Ήξερε να Κλαίει
overview: In the summer of 2021, a research group scouting for viable sites for development arrives at Armenaki Island, where people live with their own laws and their own moral values, having found happiness in a completely different way of life.
title: In This Land Nobody Knew How to Cry
